channel.title: Kurdish-BLARK

item.title: New additions to the repositories
item.description: Kids Story Reader -- Audio and Transcriptions Samples.

item.title: New additions to the repositories
item.description: A Dataset of Kurdish (Sorani) Named Entities -- An Amendment to Kurdish-BLARK Named Entities is now available.

item.title: New additions to the repositories
item.description: A language model in Kurdish (Sorani) based on KTC is now available.

channel.title: New additions to the repositories
channel.description: A new script to transliterate Kurdish text in Latin into Persian-Arabic is now available in Kurdish-BLARK repository.

item.title: New additions to the repositories
item.description: New datasets, such as diphones for text to speech and dataset to finetune Tesseract have been added to the Kurdish BLARK.

item.title: Segmented KTC - Poster Presentation
item.description: Roshna presented a poster of the related article at AfricaNLp Workshop at ICLR2020. See the presentation of the related article by Roshna here. See the related poster here.

item.title: Earlier news before 2020
item.description: Older news regarding the Kurdish-BLARK project can be found on the ResearchGate.
